changeSet.author: pwadmore
changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.STAGING_EXCEPTION', 'U') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.STAGING_EXCEPTION', 'DATETIME2_STAGING_EXCEPTION';

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.DATETIME2_STAGING_EXCEPTION', 'U') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.DATETIME2_STAGING_EXCEPTION', 'STAGING_EXCEPTION';
